verbose_text: The identification of CX3CR1 int TPM cells, a Tmem subset with self-renewal, proliferative, memory pool maintenance, and tissue surveying properties, prompted us to hypothesize that CX3CR1 int TPM cells underlie the ability of CMV and adenoviral vectors to induce and sustain large inflationary CD8 + Tmem responses.
evidence: CX3CR1 int  TPM cells underlie the ability of CMV and adenoviral vectors to induce and sustain large inflationary CD8
